item.title: Program with Python AI/ML
item.description: Here is a bunch of github stuff that may help you with python. https://github.com/adilkhash/Data-Engineering-HowTo https://github.com/mebauer/data-analysis-using-python https://github.com/PacktPublishing/Python-for-Data-Analysis-step-by-step-with-projects- https://github.com/PacktPublishing/Data-Engineering-with-Python https://github.com/kaburelabs/Data-Engineering-track-with-Python

item.title: ML & AI
item.description: Here are the list of sources that one may use to go ahead and share when looking about AI, ML, Data Engineering etc. Intro ML/AI Automotive : Parking, Speed, Distance, Driver Insurance https://www.forbes.com/sites/ginaclarke/2019/01/21/how-your-insurance-quote-is-powered-by-artificial-intelligence/ Guided / Unmanned drones Text, Speech, Image recognition https://pypi.org/project/SpeechRecognition/ Pattern Recognition & Generation in creative Arts https://www.midjourney.com/home/ https://stability.ai/blog/stable-diffusion-public-release https://openai.com/dall-e-2/ WorkFlow​ Data Engineering (Ingestion / pre-processing / Storage / Cataloguing)​

item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is my first post. Lets see how far this goes. I am using Github to create and update this using Gitpod. So YAY!
